channel.title: Welcome to My Portfolio on Kevin Douglas Delong - Software Engineer Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to My Portfolio on Kevin Douglas Delong - Software Engineer Portfolio

item.title: About Me
item.description:
I’m Kevin Douglas Delong, a dedicated software engineer with expertise in backend (e.g., Node.js, Python) and front-end (e.g., React, Flutter) development. I build scalable web, mobile, and desktop applications, focusing on user-friendly designs and efficient code.

Key Skills:

  • Web: HTML/CSS/JS, React, Next.js
  • Mobile: Flutter, React Native
  • Desktop: Electron, .NET
  • Backend: Express, Django, databases (SQL/NoSQL)

Passionate about innovative solutions—let’s connect!

item.title: Contact Me
item.description:
Reach out for collaborations, project inquiries, or source code access.

  • Email: delong.kevin@gmail.com
  • LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/kevin-delong
  • GitHub: github.com/delongkevin

For source code requests, include details about the project.

item.title: Donate
item.description:
Support my open-source projects and development work!

Find me on Venmo! https://account.venmo.com/u/KDelong147

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Explore my portfolio of web, mobile, and desktop applications. Each includes a demo embed and source code access (request permission via contact).

Scientific Calculator Web App!

Try this interactive scientific calculator with graphing capabilities—test sin(x) and plot live! Request Source Code

More projects to come :)

item.title: Resume
item.description:
Download my latest resume and cover letter (updated September 13, 2025).

  • Resume PDF

Professional Summary Results-oriented Software Engineer with 10+ years in automotive infotainment systems, specializing in backend automation, frontend UI development, and full-stack integration for web, mobile, and embedded applications. Proven track record in C++, Python, and AutoSAR architecture, collaborating on CI/CD pipelines to deliver high-quality, secure software. Excel at debugging complex SOC/IOC issues, fuzz testing protocols (CAN/Ethernet), and leading cross-functional teams to exceed milestones—reducing defects by 25% through optimized test automation. Eager to drive innovative solutions in scalable software environments.
